hero.subtitle: Colombia's First Planetary Yoga.
hero.title: A space to reconnect with yourself and with nature.
hero.descriptionPart3: and discover Varsana, a sanctuary for the soul. More than an ecovillage, it is a space where meditation, yoga and sustainability merge to provide you with deep and transformative experiences.

voluntariado.title: Volunteering
voluntariado.description: Ideal for those who want to experience the life of an Ecovillage and learn about an ancestral culture.

pasadías.title: Day Trips
pasadías.description: We have created a special day for you, full of wellness, healing, relaxation, awareness and connection with nature.

hospedaje.title: Accommodation
hospedaje.description: We have comfortable facilities, individual or group, ideal for rest.

eventos.title: Events
eventos.description: Ideal for those who want to experience the life of an Ecovillage and learn about an ancestral culture.

video.title: Are you interested in any of our programs?
video.description: We are at your service! Contact us to receive more detailed information about everything that Varsana ecovillage has to offer you. We will be happy to answer all your questions.
